content: have you tried the new caron latte cakes yet it s a really soft yarn and the colors are very gentle i decided the persimmon blue cakes i picked up would make a really nice comfort lapghan for a friend of mine in need of some love this is really just another #mg modern granny but i wanted to show you how lovely this looks when crocheted with the latte cakes the yarn is very generous and i only needed 3 cakes to make this 42 x 50 lapghan
